title: riot plesea help me get back my account(hacked)
body: my account dennis 808 get hack plz get me back I am thank you plz get me back my account riot my Emily is **[REDACTED]** if you can get me back I am so happy

replies.body:
In order to recover your account, we'll need you to submit a support ticket using [this form.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) Fill out as much info as you can recall about your account and we'll have an account specialist get back to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
If i may ask, what should be an expected time range for a response?
